description: When [Ebury](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0377) is running as an OpenSSH server, it uses LD_PRELOAD to inject its malicious shared module in to programs launched by SSH sessions. [Ebury](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0377) hooks the following functions from `libc` to inject into subprocesses;  `system`, `popen`, `execve`, `execvpe`, `execv`, `execvp`, and `execl`.(Citation: ESET Ebury Oct 2017)(Citation: ESET Ebury May 2024)

external_references.description: Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2024, May 1). Ebury is alive but unseen. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
Vachon, F. (2017, October 30). Windigo Still not Windigone: An Ebury Update . Retrieved February 10, 2021.
